keyMoments.title: CP9 Confronts Franky at Dock Six
keyMoments.description: Four CP9 members (Kalifa, Kaku, Blueno, and Rob Lucci) arrive at Dock Six to confront Franky. Kalifa knocks out Mozu and Kiwi, and Franky charges at them, mistaking them for Galley-La workers.
keyMoments.significance: This marks a major confrontation between CP9 and Franky, setting up the battle for the Pluton blueprints.

description: CP9 is a secret Cipher Pol intelligence and assassination unit of the World Government. They had been undercover in Water 7 posing as Galley-La employees while searching for the Pluton blueprints.
goals: Retrieve the Pluton blueprints from Franky
